thread.title: Chad M. Moon
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Chad M. Moon

author: Chad M. Moon
title: Chad M. Moon
text: We had no issues purchasing our red rocking chair. However, when we got the red rocking chair home and started to assemble it, we noticed that one of the bolts had broken off inside it's bracket. I went to my local Lowe's and purchased a new bolt and bracket, then replaced the broken ones. There is no way this broken bolt could have made it through a quality control inspection. Which leads me to believe that one was never performed. I do not hold the salesman or store liable for this error but I will be sure to buy any warrantees in the future and hold the entire company accountable for future quality control issues.
